item.title: Is Flying Still Safe? Why Air Incidents Are Shaking Confidence in Aviation
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Air travel fears rise as incidents across Asia increase. Is flying still safe? Decode the truth behind recent emergencies, Boeing’s role, and the Air India investigations.

item.title: Mosquito Problem on IndiGo Flight Goes Viral, Airline Responds
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: A video showing mosquitoes inside an IndiGo flight goes viral. The airline apologizes and explains the cause. Passengers react with jokes and concerns online.

item.title: Air India AI-171 Crash: Grieving Families Raise Concerns Over Compensation Process
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Families of AI-171 crash victims allege pressure over compensation. Air India denies coercion. Read the full details of the controversy.

item.title: Indigo Flight Makes Emergency Landing in Chennai After Mid-Air Technical Malfunction
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Indigo Airlines flight makes emergency landing in Chennai after mid-air engine malfunction. All 165 passengers safe as pilot and ATC execute flawless emergency protocol. Details on the incident and response.

item.title: Air India Flight 315 Returns to Hong Kong After Fuel Filter Warning
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Air India Flight 315 returned to Hong Kong after a right engine fuel filter warning. The captain’s quick response highlights growing safety concerns over fuel contamination

item.title: Air India Crash Fallout: DGCA Fires Senior Officials Amid Probe and Black Box Damage Concerns
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: DGCA fires 3 Air India officials after crash as black box investigation begins. Global experts may assist in decoding damaged flight recorders while flight cancellations add to aviation chaos.

item.title: Inside the Investigation of Air India Flight AI 171: The Story Behind the Black Boxes
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Explore the detailed investigation into Air India flight AI 171's crash, including black box recovery, data analysis challenges, and possible failure theories. Learn why aviation experts call such incidents extremely rare.

item.title: Boeing 737 Narrowly Escapes Crash Landing in Indonesia Amid Storm
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Batik Air Boeing 737 nearly crashes during landing in Jakarta amid stormy weather. Skilled piloting avoids disaster. Read full report on the dramatic incident.

item.title: Air India 171 Tragedy: What Really Happened? A Captain’s Expert Breakdown
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Aviation expert Captain Steve decodes the Air India 171 crash: Dual engine failure, RAT deployment, and why flaps weren't to blame. Complete technical breakdown of what went wrong in this rare tragedy.

item.title: Air India 171: Understanding the Tragedy and the Possibility of Vapor Lock
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: An in-depth analysis of the Air India Flight 171 crash exploring confirmed facts, engine failure theories, and the debated role of vapor lock. A technical yet human-focused perspective on aviation safety.
